derivation: from a comparative of G5495 (χειροτονέω) and (to stretch);
strongs_def: to be a hand-reacher or voter (by raising the hand), i.e. (generally) to select or appoint
outline:
1. to vote by stretching out the hand
  2. to create or appoint by vote: one to have charge of some office or duty
  3. to elect, create, appoint
